item.title: Homeland Security Sec. Kristi Noem visits ICE facility at center of Portland protests
item.description: Noem met with local law enforcement officials at the ICE facility, according to the Portland Police Bureau.

item.title: Dogs kill 2-year-old boy at Georgia daycare center
item.description: A 2-year-old boy in south Georgia has died after being attacked by two Rottweilers at an unlicensed daycare
